data.text:
Trainer-san. ……sorry for taking so long. 
About my next race――
data.name: Rhein Kraft

data.text:
My goal is to take first place in the 『NHK Mile Cup』! 
I look forward to your guidance!!
data.name: Rhein Kraft

data.text:
Yes. I thought there was something that I could show them, 
that these legs could leave behind.
data.name: Rhein Kraft

data.text:
Since Trainer-san and everyone else believes in my speed…… 
I will definitely win the title of 『Generation's Fastest』!
data.name: Rhein Kraft

data.text:
Yeah. ……『Strong Uma Musume are Strong』. 
You'll prove that in your own way, in a way that only you can!
data.name: <username>

data.text:
Yeah. ……『Strong Uma Musume are Strong』. 
You'll prove that in your own way, in a way that only you can!
data.name: <username>

data.text:
……I see. So you've decided too. 
……Alright, now that we've decided that, time's running out!
data.name: King Halo

data.text:
Something that nobody has achieved before. Obtaining the 
unorthodox double crown of the 『Oka Sho』 and 『NHK Mile C』. 
We need to make sure to train and prepare properly!
data.name: King Halo

data.text: And with that said――!

Uwaah~, so we're doing training camp here, huh!? 
Ufufu, being completely surrounded by the forest 
like this, I'll be able to sleep reeeeally well~.
data.name: Antenna-haired Uma Musume

data.text:
Idiot! You're an idiot! We're here for training camp, 
you know!? Especially for those two in the Classic 
class! They need to really train up after all!
data.name: Single Knot Uma Musume

data.text:
Trainer-san, King-san, thank you for the wonderful 
suggestion! I'm going to put my luggage away and 
get changed, okay? Let's get started soon!
data.name: Rhein Kraft

data.text:
And so, surrounded by forests, mountains, 
and nature, the days of intense training began……!

Kraft! There's a steep hill nearby. It might be a good 
place to work on dashing. Want to go check it out later?
data.name: <username>

data.text:
Kraft! There's a steep hill nearby. It might be a good 
place to work on dashing. Want to go check it out later?
data.name: <username>

data.text:
Waaah……! Thank you very much! 
Please add it to the menu!
data.name: Rhein Kraft

data.text:
And, Cesario. In preparation for the 『Oaks』 
we're going to focusing on stamina training.
data.name: <username>

data.text:
And, Cesario. In preparation for the 『Oaks』 
we're going to focusing on stamina training.
data.name: <username>

data.text:
I understand. 
By all means, thank you for your consideration.
data.name: Cesario

data.text:
Uhii-, the classic crew has it rough……!! 
But, seeing them work so hard nearby, gets me motivated!
data.name: Single Knot Uma Musume

data.text:
Well, I guess it makes you think you should work hard too…… 
Nnnnnnaa~~, I guess we should do another lap, huh!?
data.name: Antenna-haired Uma Musume

data.text:
Fufuu……isn't this fine? 
Looks like this training camp will be worthwhile!
data.name: King Halo

data.text:
We worked hard from early in the morning until sunset. 
The Classic class was working hard to prepare for this 
once-in-a-lifetime event, so they wouldn't have any regrets.
And then, after all that hard training――

Fuuuu……the fire for this grill has also been lit. It's ready to 
be used so go ahead and arrange the vegetables as you like.
data.name: Cesario

data.text:
Amazing~……You really are reliable and 
efficient when your switch is on, Cesario……!
data.name: Single Knot Uma Musume

data.text:
Yeah, yeah……but, Cesario, are you properly eating too? 
You don't have to keep looking after all of us you know~.
data.name: Antenna-haired Uma Musume

data.text:
They're right, Cesario-san. 
Nutrition is quite important for building up your body after all!
data.name: King Halo

data.text:
That's right! That big carrot wrapped in foil that we 
grilled is almost ready isn't it? I'll go get it!
data.name: Rhein Kraft

data.text:
Fufu, thank you. But, I'll go cut it, so do you want to 
split it? Kraft, you'd probably burn yourself after all.
data.name: Cesario

data.text: Ehh!? Aren't you treating me too much like a kid!? C'mon-……!
data.name: Rhein Kraft

data.text:
Heeey, everyone! I bought a bunch of apples for dessert. 
Think it's about time I started peeling them?
data.name: <username>

data.text:
Heeey, everyone! I bought a bunch of apples for dessert. 
Think it's about time I started peeling them?
data.name: <username>

data.text: Oh, how thoughtful!
data.name: King Halo

data.text:
Trainer……are you gonna be okay? 
It'd be bad if you cut yourself, should I peel them instead?
data.name: Cesario

choices.text: Huh? Now I'm treated like a kid too!?
Huh? Now I'm treated like a kid too!?

data.text:
Ahahaha! 
Trainer-san, you're just like me now, huh?
data.name: Rhein Kraft

data.text:
The team's cheerful laughter filled the air. 
After exhausting themselves with intense training, 
it was time to replenish those lost nutrients――

And then tomorrow, they'd resume their intense 
training, aiming for victory. And that's how 
they spent the rest of training camp――

Haaa, I'm exhausted today too~……! 
I guess the training camp is coming to an end soon, huh?
data.name: Rhein Kraft

data.text:
Yeah……but I do feel like I've made good progress towards the 
『Oaks』. It feels like my stamina has improved quite a lot.
data.name: Cesario

data.text:
Me too! Since I've been working on improving my 
dash strength, I feel like my starts are getting 
much smoother and I'm able to pull ahead easier.
data.name: Rhein Kraft

data.text:
Yeah――It's good. I feel the difference. I think I'm 
all set, in regards to winning at the 『NHK Mile C』!
data.name: Rhein Kraft

data.text:
……I wonder if there's anyone watching me. If I'll be able to…… 
leave something behind. ……I want to leave something behind.
data.name: Rhein Kraft

data.text: ――Hey, you know how they say 『It kind of feels like fate』?
data.name: Rhein Kraft

data.text:
Yeah……do you think it's something unique to Uma Musume? 
But, I know what you mean. I can't really put it in 
words though……kind of like how I feel with Spe-san.
data.name: Cesario

data.text:
Right! Kind of like some mysterious force pulling 
on you……or leading you. Like when you're with 
them, you feel this warm light in your chest.
data.name: Rhein Kraft

data.text: To become that 『Something』 for someone. That's what I want too.
data.name: Rhein Kraft

data.text:
To have someone feel that kind of fate with 
you……huh. You're right, that dream you've 
always been talking about is a bit like that.
data.name: Cesario

data.text:
Yeah! If my running can make someone feel some kind of fate……
if my aspiration becomes that link for someone, it would be nice.
data.name: Rhein Kraft

data.text:
……Cesario. 
I'm going to win the 『NHK Mile C』
data.name: Rhein Kraft

data.text:
……Yeah. 
Someone will definitely be watching you.
data.name: Cesario

data.text:
……Alright, we have an early morning tomorrow so we should get to 
bed. Let's get a good rest and work hard again tomorrow, Kraft.
data.name: Cesario

data.text: Yeah. Good night, Cesario!
data.name: Rhein Kraft

data.text:
(I'll keep doing my best, and run. So I can leave something 
behind. ……I'll definitely leave something behind)
data.name: Rhein Kraft

data.text: (My heritage, without a doubt)
data.name: Rhein Kraft
